title: Polyxena, Priam's Daughter, Is Sacrificed on Achilles's Tomb (Polyxène, fille de Priam, est égorgée sur la tombe d'Achille) from Les Métamorphoses
medium: Etching from an illustrated book with 30 etchings
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 9 x 6 3/4" (22.9 x 17.1 cm); page: 12 5/8 x 10 1/4" (32 x 26 cm)
